message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product which I believe would be very valuable for you.  I'm thinking around $15,000 would be a fair price. What are your thoughts?
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I understand its value to you, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. Could we possibly meet in the middle?
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but $15,000 is already a competitive price.  How about we settle at $13,000? I'm confident you'll see a great return on this investment.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, could we possibly agree on $11,000 for the product?
